data.title: Meet Your Neighbors Book Lists
data.meta_description: Celebrate the diversity of Oldham County with books that represent a spectrum of human experiences. Arab & Middle Eastern History Month Folktales for a better world : stories of peace and kindness Laird, Elizabeth Behind you is the sea : a novel Darraj, Susan Muaddi Every rising sun : a novel A1
